column1: event,"WOW!!! it's been a while since I was last here on LJ, but it's nice to know I still remember my user name and password. hahahaha
Any hoot.... Another year has passed. I would like to thank everyone who remember my B-day and either called. texted, bbm, facebooked, etc etc etc... their congradulations to me
event,"As usual, here is this years $hit List of people who I expected that would call me to say Happy B-day...YOU GUYS SUCK!!!!!
event,"Thanks to everyone who called, e-mailed, texted, voiced mailed or found a way to say HAPPY B-DAY. Much love to you and my best wishes and prayers are with you
event,"Two many trips, too little time (even for sleep)
LOGOVO: Thank you sooo much for the SPN links. I plan on enjoying them this weekend as I am going to VEG-OUT on my couch / bed and only watch season 6.
I am going over for 1 night to Guadalajara, Jal.. This is home to very good food (Tortas Ahogadas, Carnes en su Jugo and Tequila).
I also heard there is a NEW trilogy out on paperback, so I need reviews:
event,"I am in Mexico City toda because they made us work. I can't beleive it... Just because they didn't want to wait till Monday, OMG!!!.
So, as I sit here just listening to a bunch of jibber-jabber, I felt like posting some quick updates :-)
1.- I have an I-phone and a Nextel Blackberry
2.- My restaurant is going great ""La Caminera"" (3 months oppend now)
3.- Just bought Season 3 of Leverage and Season 4 of Burn Notice
4.- Waiting for Captain America and HP (DHpt2)
5.- NFL season... Just sign already, they are only hurting the fans!!!!
6.- My son turns 14 this september. I think a condom is a great gift at this point
8.- Waitinf for september to buy SPN season 6 ... Will there be a Season 7??? Anyone????
9.- Tires are very expensive in Monterrey... so I'm broke!!!
10.- Happy B-day Brenda, live long and prosper (Vulcan symbol held high)"
event,"I can't beleive I could only see the season openers of both shows!!!!
I missed the entire 6th season of SPN and the FINAL season of SV. I will have to make up for it when I buy the dvd's. No release date yet but it should come out soon.
The good thing is that cable shows are about to go back on the air:
I am traveling a lot to Mexico City with my new Job responsibilities (same company), I am here at least once a week. It gives me time to see my GF (of 2 months)"
event,"One of my clients was very greatfull with me for and end of the month sale we could acheive. As a gift he gave me an I-Phone.... WOW!!!!
Sure it's last years model, but it's NEW!!!! and it was for FREE!!!!!.
I already downloaded 200 videos and close to 2,000 songs to it. I bought the case protector and the screen protector as well.
event,"This was the most memorable scene from the first film THE BOONDOCK SAINTS:
Connor: Now you will receive us.
Murphy: We do not ask for your poor, or your hungry.
Connor: We do not want your tired and sick.
Murphy: It is your corrupt we claim.
Connor: It is your evil that will be sought by us.
Murphy: With every breath we shall hunt them down.
Connor: Each day, we will spill their blood till it rains down from the skies.
Murphy: Do not kill, do not rape, do not steal, these are principles which every man of every faith can embrace.
Connor: These are not polite suggestions, these are codes of behavior and those of you that ignore them will pay the dearest cost.
Murphy: There are varying degrees of evil, we urge you lesser forms of filth not to push the bounds and cross over, into true corruption, into our domain.
Connor: For if you do, one day you will look behind you and you will see we three. And on that day, you will reap it.
Murphy: And we will send you to whatever god you wish.
[Murphy and Conner join II Duce behind Yakavetta]
Connor, Murphy, Il Duce: And shepherds we shall be, for Thee, my Lord, for Thee. Power hath descended forth from Thy hand.
Connor, Murphy, Il Duce: That our feet may swiftly carry out Thy command. So we shall flow a river forth to Thee, and teeming with souls shall it ever be.
event,"Japan got hit with an 8.9 Quake, and a 30ft tsunami.
All the Japan staff here in mexico city is freaking out and they are in closed meetings
I hope everyone is ok down there and wish them the best.
BCS (Cabos) should get the first wave by 2pm"
Angus Wall and Kirk Baxter, The Social Network
Rick Baker and Dave Elsey, The Wolfman
Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross, The Social Network
We Belong Together"" from Toy Story 3, music and lyrics by Randy Newman
event,"Her are some quotes I found interesting while reading a book I found like 7 years ago...
No love, no friendship can cross the path of our destiny without leaving some mark on it forever."" - Francois Muriac
Walking across the thin ice of my dreams, Fearing the cold waters of reality beneath me. Yet onward I tred."" - Author Unknown
Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart ... Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside awakens."" - Carl Gustav Jung
By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest."" - Confucius
A belief is not merely an idea the mind possesses; it is an idea that possesses the mind."" - Robert Bolton
The man who follows the crowd will usually get no further than the crowd. The man who walks alone is likely to find himself in places no one has ever been."" - Alan Ashley-Pitt
Suicide is not chosen---it happens when pain exceeds resources for coping with pain"" - Author Unknown

People are like stained glass windows: they sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light within."" - Elizabeth Kubler-Ross
Icy claws with tender touches are the gifts she brings to me. Swallowed in the mindless void of sex and misery.""
Damaged people are dangerous, they know they can survive.""
When we lose the right to be different, we lose the privilege to be free."" - Charles Evans Hughes
For those who understand you, no explanation is necessary. For those who don't, none is possible.""

We make the dragons as we make the gods, because we need them, because somewere deep in our hearts, we recognize that a world without them is a world not worth living in. No, I would not want to live in a world without dragons, as I would not want to live in a world wihtout magick, for that is a world without mystery, and that is a world without faith.
I stayed up all night playing poker with tarot cards. I got a full house and four people died.""
Remember youth as you pass by,
As you was once, so once was I,
As I am now, you soon will be,
Prepare to die and follow me.
All that we see or seem, Is but a dream within a dream.
I'm afraid to believe that there is hope somewhere in my black heart for the darkness to be shown the light.""

We strive to destroy the evil around us. Yet, we often forget that there is no light without darkness, nor darkness without light. Perhaps a plant it the best analogy. A plant realizes that too little light is deadly, but it also knows that too much light is equally deadly. It is the balance of the two that makes the world.""
The cat has always been associated with the Moon. For like the moon, it comes to life at night, escaping from humanity and wandering over housetops with its eyes beaming out through the darkness."""

event,"A birthstone is a gift of a precious material (jewelry, mainly gemstones; themselves traditionally associated with various qualities) that symbolizes the month of birth in the Gregorian calendar. It is sometimes also called birthday stone (cf. infra; but that word is, confusingly, sometimes used as a synonym for an anniversary gift, which is related to the recipient's age, that is, year of birth).
Hope your 2010 was more than great and here is well wishes fro your future endeavors
It's not my problem. That's her (his) job.""

Offering this phrase to a supervisor will communicate two things: that you are not a team player and blame others rather than create solutions. If asked about something outside of your job's scope, a better response is: ""I don't usually handle that, but I'd be happy to look into it.""
Are you pregnant? Can I feel?""

Never ask a woman if she's pregnant. The awkwardness and self-esteem shattering that occurs when she says she's not is best avoided. At the same time, asking to feel a coworker's third-trimester belly is never appropriate. Do so only if she invites it.
How many feminists does it take to screw in a light bulb ...?""

Humor often comes from the denigration of a group -- be it ethnicity, gender, religion or sexual preference. Off-color jokes are never acceptable in the workplace, as they may create a threatening environment for a coworker.
I'd like to blow this place up.""

In today's environment, this type of hyperbole could be taken seriously by a coworker. At the very least, someone might become fearful or distrustful of you. At most, you may be reported and investigated.
You voted for him? Are you stupid?""

Political talk is not banned from the workplace, but it must be handled delicately. People very easily get riled up, so take care not to voice feelings of anger or judgment when talking about a candidate or race."
Sam asks Dean for help after finding a baby at the scene of its parents' murder. Meanwhile, Dean becomes angry when he learns that his grandfather, Samuel, decides to raise the child as a hunter.
Lisa: It's okay. You want to go, so go.
Dean: You know what, Sam can handle this.
Lisa: Dean, no offense, but if you don't walk out that door, I'm going to shoot you.
Dean: This is like defusing an IED with poop.
Dean: I'm not shoving anybody into this life. Okay, this is temporary.
Sam: Dad always said it was temporary, Dean. He said it for 22 years
* Sam: Welcome to the party, Guttenberg.

Referencing actor Steve Guttenberg, who appeared in the movie 3 Men and a Baby. Guttenberg's character is one of three single professional men who have to raise a baby left with them, and have no idea how to handle it.
* Sam: You got a whole Dr. Huxtable vibe coming off of you.

Referencing comedian Bill Cosby's character on The Cosby Show, pediatrician Cliff Huxtable. Cliff raised five children and had time for his wife, all while indulging in his appetite for hero sandwiches and quirky humor.
Referencing the long-running CBS sitcom starring Charlie Sheen, Jon Cryer, and Angus T. Jones which debuted in 2003."

Sam is mysteriously released from Hell and seeks out his brother, trying to have a normal life. Together the brothers must join forces with their maternal grandfather, Samuel, and begin the fight anew
Lisa: You're an idiot. I mean, I know it wasn't greeting-card perfect, but we were in it together.
Dean: I was a wreck half the time.
Lisa: Yeah, well, the guy that basically just saved the world shows up at your door, you expect him to have a couple of issues.
Dean: Do you have any clue what walking away meant for me?
Bobby: Yeah, a woman and a kid... and not getting your guts ripped out at age 30. That's what it meant.
Dean: That woman and that kid, I went to them because you asked me to.

Dean: Good for who? I showed up on their doorstep half out of my head with grief. God knows why they even let me in. I drank too much, I had nightmares. I looked everywhere. I collected hundreds of books trying to find anything to bust you out.
Sam: You promised you'd leave it alone.
Dean: Of course, I didn't leave it alone! Sue me!
Dean: There's not much to tell. Lived on the road. Took crap jobs that nobody else wanted.
Dean: Yeah. Get to work with a partner. You get to help people. You have no idea what's in some people's walls. Could eat them alive."

event,"First and most important off all. Happy anniversary to ""The Beebo"" and his wife. They got hitched this day in history about 10 years ago, so it's the X aniversary
This is also day that would have marked my 16th. Instead it's my 7th lighting a candle to always remember this day. Thus always makes me remember this passage form the Original Highlander movie:
descending a rear stairwell, FOOTSTEPS ECHOING off the concrete. He stops on a landing, shutting his eyes.
MacLeod and Heather leave Jedburgh and move east, settling on a farm outside Montrose.
Years become decades. She changes. Her youth fades. MacLeod is with her constantly.
Breathing her last, she lies in his arms, clutching a
sheepskin doll. She strokes his ageless cheek.
Her eyes fill with tears. MacLeod fights for control, smoothing her hair.
Because I love you as much now as the day I first met you.
Crying, she turns away. Tormented, he cradles her head, holding her tight.
I don't want to die. I want to stay with you forever.
Will you do something for me, Conner
In years to come, will you light a candle and remember me on my birthday?
event,"1.- I got my tatto done this past friday. It took over 3 hours, but it's finished. They even took a picture at the end of the session. I will try and get a pic uploaded.

2.- My arm hurts but it's getting better (due to the ink job). Should be at 100% in 2 weeks (By the 13th). I can't eat pork or sea food. Have to stay clear of direct sunlight, seas, oceans and pools. Wash it once a day witha neutral soap and a cream twice a day.
3.- I got a celtic Omega witha celtric trinity symbol and latin lettering."

event,"Getting the 3rd an final tattoo done tomorrow. See there is some lore about tattoo's here in Mexico. You always have to have odd number tattoo's, (1, 3, 5, etc...). So I knew from the start it would always be 3.

Another lore is that getting ink done is addictive, they are correct!!! Once I got the first one done, I couldn't wait for 2 and 3. The second one took me one month to get, but the 3rd one has taking me over 1 year.

Before, I would bring my own design, they would run it thru the computer and BAM!!!!. This time I couldn't find something that filled my ink need's, so I talked with their resident artist and told him exactly what I wanted.

I hope I can get a picture tonight so I can see what I will be getting or at least be able to make some changes. What I do know is that there will be greek and latin symbolism and will connect with by celtic cross tattoo.
Tha usage of many colors have been approved"
event,"A few words I picked up in Latin watching the movie ""The Boondock Saints"" this weekend.
Verity and Equity or Truth and Justice

As for the movie it self was released in 2006. The story of two Irish brothers, Connor and Murphy, who believe themselves ordained by God to rid the world of evil men. Their first killing is in self-defense; but after that, they start killing with devotion, gunning down a summit of the Russian mafia. Willem Dafoe plays a gay FBI agent (he listens to opera while examining crime scenes) who knows what the boys are doing but feels that their vigilante tactics are necessary....he is very good in this movie.
For Thee, my Lord, for Thee.
Power hath descended forth from Thy hand,
That our feet may swiftly carry out Thy command.
So we shall flow a river forth to Thee
And teeming with souls shall it ever be.
In nomine Patris et Filii et Spiritus Sancti.

The family prayer, is a prayer to illustrate an oath/oration to God, that they will do all in their power to shepherd the weak through the evils brought forth by evil men and the dissatisfaction with those who would do harm to the innocents, and giving thanks to God to be able to do something about it. (See: Ezekiel 25:17) That the souls of the wicked shall be purified by blood, and sent back to their maker, if it is in their power.
In nomine Patris, et Filii, et Spiritus Sancti.""
Means ""In the name of the father, of the son, and the Holy Spirit"" roughly."

event,"Don't ask me why I bought an issue of Brides magazine...(I still can't understand it my self). But I found thia article on wedding vows and I thought they were very touching.

(Insert wifes name here), through all the tears and struggles, I always knew in my heart that we'd make it here. I promise to love and respect you from this point forward as your husband, as my wife, my lover, my friend, and my soul mate. All I am is yours.

(Insert husbands name here), you are the best thing that has ever happened to me. I was afraid that you were too good to be true, that maybe I didn't deserve someone so pure and beautiful and loving as you are. But here we are surrounded by the people that we love the most and I feel so proud, and so blessed to be your wife. I was born to love you and I always will.
AAAAAHHHHHHHHH..... just felt like posting something like this for once"

event,"I have advised the corporate office of the situation in the Monterrey Office due to the heavy rain and flooding brought by Tropical Storm ALEX.
The Goverment Officials for Monterrey city has suspended all clases and acitivities due to the contingency plan.  Only emergency activities are in place.
The Goverment Officials have requested the Private sector to be leinient with thier workers because of the difficulties to arrive a their working place.
1. The office is with out electric power due to a trasnformer that failed. They do not have estimated time to repair as there are problems all around Monterrey.
2.  No telephone line due to the above problem.
3. Only 3 employees have gone to Office with great difficulties.
4. Employees living in low income areas  have difficulty to go to the Office.
5. At the moment there is no report of employees being hurt.
I think that human safty is very important and No.1 proirity.
This was 3 times bigger than Hurricane Gilbert back in 1988.
So far 12 dead and over 30 missing. 50% is wothout water and 15% with out power"
Mexico tried, they realy did, it just wasn't enough against a soccer power house like them.
I will not complain about the officials, Mexico allowed a 3-0 lead and no one can bounce back from that. A good team overcomes ALL adversaties.
Now I can support 100% my favorite team...GERMANY!!!!
they will face Argentina in the Qtr finals.
So far the temas that have advanced are:
2 teams are left to fill out the elite eight"
event,"Today was the 3rd and final game for Mexico's National team. Ther were 3 scenarios:
3.- Loose and hope the other game didn't end in a blow out eaither way and move on due to the goal diffirential.

Well... Mexico lost!!! 1-0, but they are still in and moved to the 2nd round of the world cup that should start on Sunday. Their rival is none other than Argentina. I think it will be a ""payback"" mind set for the national team.
In the 2nd game Sout Africa won 2-1 over France, but couldn't move on due to the goal diffirential. But a great effort was put in by the Home Country"
2-0 (NIL, BIG GOOSE EGG, NADA, ZILCH...you get the point)
Mexico played their hearts out and got a goal with a wide open net and a penalty kick.. ANOTHER STANDING OVATION!!!!!
Next up is Urugay vs the ""Tricolor"" Team (Mexico) on the 22nd. at 9:00 am pst
If Mexico ties or wins, they are in, as well as Urugay. They will probably negotiate something within a few days so both teams make it in the playoff round."
Both teams played their hearts out. STANDING OVATION!!!!!
Next up are the French vs the ""Tricolor"" Team (Mexico) on the 17th. at 11:30 am pst
The division is up for grabs as all 4 teams scored 1 point. It's now a race of 2 games for the best positioning. This could come down to a differential in goals."
event,"Yes sir, the World Cup Tournament that is held every 4 years is obly 3 days away. This time it is held in South Africa and Mexico gets the inagural game (pressure!!!!)
Lets hope they have a great showing!!!!"
All times Pacific. Home games in BOLD."
event,"It's season finaly week on the warner Channel (Latin Channel). They will air SPN, SV, V, The big Bang Theory and Two and a Half Men), so it's a good TV week in Mexico.
I went to McAllen, Tx last week and that put and end to my car Trips (till next week any way). I will go to Laredo, Tx next week.
I am in Mexico City today and tomorrow. And I will visit Tijuana on the 25th, the main reason is because my son will graduate from elementery school that day (6th grade).
This is a mile stone for him as he is about to turn into a teenager in september, for the start of Jr High... I am getting old!!!!"
I drove for 4 hours to reach Zacatecas (4 hours from guadalajara) to attend a wedding.

On friday it was the Civil wedding, followed by a ""Callejoneada"". Basicly all the guest have to walk thru a series of narrow streets following the bride and the groom with a band. They give out beer and tequila or mezcal shots. It all comes to an end when they reach a kiosk, where they have more beer and tacos. We then went to a bar called ""La Mina"" (The mine). They take you in a mining cart (like indiana jones) for about 2 minutes till you reach the club which is inside a deserted mine... very cool.
On saturday it was the religious wedding and the dinner was held in an old bullring with a live band. We finished up around 5 am.

Now I am back in Monterrey and I am getting ready for a trip to McAllen, Tx. tomorrow. That's another 600kms total. So in a streach of 1 week I will have driven over 2,400 kms. Kind of getting tired."
event,"A little bit tired right now. I have driven over 1,500 kms in the past two days wisiting Torreon and Saltillo. Very good food and a well executed biz trip with my boss.

I was also in Tijuana and San Diego last week on a biz trip, but I took in my son's football game. They lost 30 - 12 but the kids gave great effort. My son left in the middle of the second Qtr with a light spain on his knee, but he is OK.

It was a great learning experience for him as this is the first game they lost, so now he can start to understand that winning isn't a gimmee and has to be gratious in defeat and humble in victory. As a treat I gave him new sneekers.

Now I am off to Zacatecas to a wedding (that's another 500 kms just to get there). There should be good times there as I am taking tomorrow off and comming back on sunday. Hopefully I will have some pics."
A stron 8 out of 10... I loved how it was narrated by the Prophet CHUCK!!!!
To stop the Apocalypse, Dean and Sam have no choice but to make decisions that will change their lives forever... and cost them everything they hold dear.

Sam and Dean begin their final showdown with Lucifer. And we finally get an appearance by God...Sam says yes to Lucifer, Adam returns as Michael and Dean has to accept that he will have to say goodbye to Sam forever...or will he?
And the Impala gets it's own storyline...EXCELLENT!!!!
Music: Carry On Wayward Son (Kansas), Rock of Ages (Def Leppard)

Chuck: On April 21, 1967, the 100 millionth GM vehicle rolled off the line at the plant in Janesville--a blue two-door Caprice. There was a big ceremony, speeches, the lieutenant governor even showed up. Three days later, another car rolled off that same line. No one gave two craps about her. But they should have. because that 1967 Chevrolet Impala would turn out to be the most important car--no, the most important object--in pretty much the whole universe.
Sam: You're gonna let me say yes?
Dean: No, that's the thing. It's not on me to let you do anything. You're a grown--well, overgrown--man. If this is what you want, I'll back your plan.
Sam: That's the last thing I thought you'd ever say.
Sam: Take care of these guys, okay?
Castiel: Oh. i was supposed to lie. (chuckles) Uh... sure. They'll be fine, I...

Bobby sells his soul to Crowley in return for the location of Death. Meanwhile, Castiel must intervene when Pestilence infects the Winchesters with a deadly disease, and Dean makes a deal with Death.
Death drives a 1959 Cadillac Coupe deVille.

The previous week's previews of this episode featured extra/alternate shots during Death's arrival in Chicago: there's a shot of the license plate on the front of his car reading ""Buh-Bye."" Also, when Death brushes off his shoulder, he looks back at the man.
Death: (concerning Lucifer) I'm more powerful than you can process and I'm enslaved to a bratty child having a tantrum.
Crowley: Oh, more like pawned it. I fully intend to give it back.
Dean: Well, then give it back!
Bobby: Why did you take a picture!?
Crowley: Why did you have to use tongue?
Castiel: You said ""no"" to Michael. I owe you an apology.
Castiel: You are not the burnt and broken shell of a man that I believed you to be.
Dean: Thank you. I appreciate that.
